DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate relative bioavailability lovastatin ß-hydroxy acid 600 mg LipoCol Forte® Capsules compare one 20 mg Mevacor® Tablet single oral administration healthy subject use 2x2 crossover design .
DOC.brief_title: Lovastatin Its ß-hydroxy Acid From Four 600 mg LipoCol Forte® Capsules Compared That One 20 mg Mevacor® Tablet Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy subject randomly allocate receive single dose either four 600 mg red yeast rice capsule one 20 mg lovastatin tablet ; 7-day washout period , receive single dose alternative drug . The subject fast least 10 hour dosing . The investigational product administer 240 mL water subject upright position . The blood sample collect prior drug administration ( T0 ) , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 12 hour dose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must age 2040 year old good health basis medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , chest Xray , routine laboratory evaluation . 2 . Vital sign ( 3 minute rest upright position ) within follow range : Ear body temperature 35.037.5 degree celsius ( °C ) . Systolic blood pressure , 90140 millimeter mercury ( mm Hg ) . Diastolic blood pressure , 5090 millimeter mercury ( mm Hg ) . Pulse rate , 5090 beat per minute ( bpm ) . Fasting blood glucose , < 110 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) . 3 . Body weight must 50 kilogram ( kg ) within 20 +20 % ideal body weight . 4 . Able sign inform consent prior study . 5 . Able communicate well investigator comply requirement study . 1 . Use prescription medication within 14 day prior dose . 2 . Use overthecounter medication vitamin within 14 day prior dose . 3 . Significant illness within 2 week prior dose . 4 . Participation clinical investigation within 2 month prior dose longer required local regulation . 5 . Donate loss 500 milliliter ( mL ) blood within 3 month prior dose . 6 . Presence cardiovascular disease . 7 . Presence gastrointestinal disease . 8 . Presence asthma lung disease . 9 . Presence liver disease liver injury indicate abnormal liver function profile . 10 . Presence impair renal function . 11 . Presence neurological disease . 12 . Presence psychiatrical disease . 13 . A known hypersensitivity lovastatin Chinese Red Yeast Rice analog . 14 . History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose . 15 . Permanent confinement institution . 16 . Pregnant lactating woman . 17 .
